page.title: 04Entertainment Deptford
page.content: In Deptford there are lots of things to buy especially on a Saturday when the markets open.In the night there are lots of places to go.Some people go to the crypt.Some people go to late nightclubs and Discos.At the crypt people go there to play pool Table Tennis and listing to some music.In Deptford there are some snooker clubs.In some snooker clubs they have gambling machines.In sport centers people play football.some of them come to learn skills and to learn how to controll the ball.There are lots of nice parks in Deptford,but not many places to catch fish.There are no cinemas left here,but lots of video shops have sprung up in the last few years.There is the Deptford cub and scout packs and brownies and girl guide scout packs and brownies and girl guides as well.
